main: Consumes {status:BloodDinner} to give {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst} to self and an ally. She also gives it to herself and Reson allies using her S3.

At 25+ stacks, her S3 consumes all stacks of {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst} and uses S3-2 instead, which gets +2 atk weight and increased damage and status applications. Both S3s apply {status:FestivalFeverRodion} to self and Reson allies based on her {status:BloodDinner_Accumulation}, increasing damage against targets with {status:Laceration}. S3-2 also applies more {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst}.
other: When her passive is active, she gains {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst} whenever an ally takes {status:Laceration} damage or consumes {status:BloodDinner}.
Allies with {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst} gain {status:DefenseUp} and inflict {status:Laceration} against attackers when taking damage, consuming a stack.

Can gain up to 30 stacks of {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst} instead of 10, and at 10+ or 20+ stacks, she inflicts an additional 1 or 2 more {status:Laceration} and {status:Burst} on her skills respectively.

Her defense is a clashable counter that lowers {status:Laceration} Count on allies while still generating the {status:BloodDinner} that would have been generated if they received the {status:Laceration} damage. It also gives her some {status:BloomingThornsRodionFirst}.
Her passive heals her based on her damage dealt. Any excess healing will go to the ally with the least HP%.

1091101.desc:
When an other ally takes [Laceration] damage or consumes [BloodDinner], gain 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] (3 times per turn)
Heal HP on self by 20% of the damage dealt with base Skills (max 10 per Skill)
1091101.name: Hardblood Thorn

1091102.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will fill the surface.
1091102.name: Bloodfeast

1091111.desc:
When an other ally takes [Laceration] damage or consumes [BloodDinner], this unit gains 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] (5 times per turn)
Heal HP on self by 20% of the damage dealt with base Skills (max 10 per Skill)
- At max HP, heal 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by excess healing
1091111.name: Hardblood Thorn

1091121.desc: To 1 ally with the highest [Laceration] Potency at Turn End: reduce the ally's [Laceration] Potency by 6 max, and apply ([Laceration] Potency reduced / 2) [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] (rounded down)
1091121.name: "Blossom with Blood..."

data.desc:
[StartBattle] On self and 1 ally with the highest max HP: consume up to 20 [BloodDinner] and apply 1 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst] for every 10 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed (2 times per turn)
- Prioritizes <Bloodfiend> allies
- If the affected ally is a <Bloodfiend>, this unit applies 1 additional [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]
data.name: Begone...

  - If this effect reduces [Laceration] Count to 0, [Laceration] expires
[WinDuel] Gain 4 [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
